content.rendered:
bar de beauté à mile end | THE TEN SPOT®

bienvenue au bar de beauté 10spot® à mile end, montréal. notre équipe est pleine d’experts qualifiés qui savent comment vous faire paraître et vous sentir mieux ! nous proposons une variété de services comme l’épilation à la cire, les soins du visage, le soin des ongles et l’épilation au laser. lorsque vous nous rendrez visite, notre formidable équipe vous mettra sur la bonne voie pour prendre les mesures nécessaires pour vous se sentir comme un dix.

reserve maintenant!
acheter cartes cadeaux
devenir membre
inscription à la newsletter

Get Directions

Add Waypoint
show options hide options
Print directions Reset directions
Recherche des itinéraires…...
Reset directions
Print directions
bar de beauté à mile end | THE TEN SPOT®
  • 5107 park ave montreal, quebec
  • 514-279-3010
  • mileend@thetenspot.com

Hours

lundi: fermé

mardi: 09:30 am – 7:00 pm

mercredi: 09:30 am – 7:00 pm

jeudi: 09:30 am – 8:00 pm

vendredi: 09:30 am – 8:00 pm

samedi.: 9:00 am – 6:00 pm

dimanche.: 10:00 am – 5:00 pm

notre bar à beauté les services

clous

nous offrons la meilleure manucure-pédicure en ville ! nous proposons des extensions d’ongles, des ongles en gel, des pédicures et bien d’autres encore.

voir le menu des services

épilation

nous proposons des services d’épilation de premier ordre conçus pour vous faire sentir comme notre brazilly®, notre thongkini®, notre épilation générale pour tout le corps et bien plus encore.

voir le menu des services

soins du visage

notre équipe possède de sérieuses compétences en matière de soins du visage. nous proposons des procédures faciales sans stress comme des soins du visage anti-âge, du dermaplaning, des peelings chimiques et bien d’autres encore.

voir le menu des services

les sourcils

quelle meilleure façon de vous faire plaisir qu’en vous faisant refaire les sourcils et les cils. que vous recherchiez un rehaussement de cils, un lifting des sourcils ou plus, nous faisons tout.

voir le menu des services

laser

l’épilation peut être délicate, c’est pourquoi nous simplifions les choses avec notre superbe gamme de traitements d’épilation au laser comme notre laser bikini, notre laser complet du corps et bien plus encore.

voir le menu des services
réservez maintenant à cet endroit!

consultez nos superbes critiques!

Came for a lash lift and brow wax with Kathy, she was amazing! She is super meticulous and I’m in love with the results. 10/10 recommend!
Isabelle Bernard
1721568773
Amazing service! So clean with amazing staff and absolutely perfect results. I love a place that makes you feel welcomed and SO CLEAN. 10/10 and I will be back!
Janet Antonelli
1718824838
I come here all the time for my waxing appointments and cannot say enough good words about this place. Kathy is super gentle and always make sure I book with her!!
Marie-Pierre Paradis-Claes
1717193964
The BEST and EASIEST place to book lashes in the Plateau / Mile end!!! I had a lash lift from Katie she was super sweet
Olivia Popescu
1715359485
Wow! Cathy is an absolute gem in the world of waxing! Her attention to detail is unmatched – she never misses a spot, leaving my skin smoother than ever before. Not only is she thorough, but she's also incredibly gentle, making the experience... surprisingly comfortable. Beyond her skills, Cathy's friendly demeanor makes every appointment feel like catching up with an old friend. With her amazing services, Cathy has truly set the bar high for waxing perfection!plus
K
1714862572
It was my first time at The Ten Spot and i'm really satisfed. I did a lash lift and tint with Kathy and she was so nice and gentle. I reaaly recommand !
Mathilde Charles
1714267531
I am a Canadian living in the US so being in my home country is always a treat. My manicure was meticulously executed alongside gentle care that was taken on my cuticles.
Jenny Wong
1713304610
What an excellent experience, I would highly recommend The Ten Spot on Avenue du Parc in Mile-end. I had my eyebrows tinted and shaped with Tania who always very professional and nice. The Ten Spot is also very hygienic.
Carole Chevrier
1711126519
Kathy is amazing and always does exactly what I show her. Cannot recommend more !
Audrey Ah-Sing
1707968314
I always go to Kathy for my brow lam and she does an amazing job. Today I tried a lash lift and tint and I am so happy with the results! Highly recommend!
Camille Simard
1706989077
Always a great experience, Bonnie is wonderful with designs. She did both my Disney nails for my honeymoon and my olive branch nails for the holidays. Highly recommend the ten spot in Mile End.
Christine B
1703363889
Always have great manicures and pedicures here! Love that they offer services for kids too. Our 7 year old gets treated so well here, she loves it too!
Elena Caro
1702484205
very satisfied with bonnie. so polite, clean, gentle and she is amazing at what she does.can do any nail design just to her clients liking. she is excellent and very professional will DEFINITELY be going back to her.
alessia da silva
1702347554
Highly recommend checking out the ten spot at the mile end location. Had such a lovely experience with Bonnie! It truly felt like royalty, with the excellent service, constant care and pampering. I got a shellac manicure with French tips and a quick... pedi and it was quite the lovely treat. I have been seeing Bonnie for over a year and have loved every set. She’s very kind, and even re-did a whole set when I had an issue with it, she was so patient and understanding. Always accommodating and creative!plus
Momo G
1690718521
I have been going back a couple times now to get my shellac and laser treatment done. I have been very satisfied with Kathy's services (laser, nail and lash lift). Very thoughtful and meticulous at her work! This is the design she did for me for... Valentine's season and I really love it ! ♥plus
Yunxiing
1675661116
‹
›
